description: Orchestrates the article creation workflow: routes the query to the writer, sends draft to evaluator, passes evaluation to improver, and aggregates the final improved article with SEO metadata

example_response.evaluation_summary: Brief summary of the quality evaluation
example_response.changes_made: Summary of improvements from draft to final
